channel.title: Reptiles on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Reptiles on ZooBerry

item.title: Nique's Aussie Pack
item.description: Bring the Australian outback to your zoos with animals and unique foliage.

item.title: Dwarf Crocodile
item.description: A reptilian addition to your zoo.

item.title: Sand Goanna
item.description: A resident of the Australian scrub.

item.title: American Crocodile
item.description: An endangered North American crocodile.

item.title: Bearded Dragon
item.description: A reptile addition.

item.title: American Alligator
item.description: Simply an alligator. Thank you Zoo-Master for facts about alligators.

item.title: American Alligator (ES Version)
item.description: Includes 100% Endangered Species design with new features for the American Alligator.

item.title: Jungle Escape
item.description: Add an UXP containing several birds from different tropical regions. Objects fit perfectly with the default jungle theme.

item.title: Endless Ocean: Luminous
item.description: A pack containing a plethora of aquatic animals created by Buffzoo, majorgalah, and gamevideosforlife.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Pterosaur Pack North America
item.description: A collection of pterosaurs from North America.

item.title: Bog Pack
item.description: A Bog Pack made by Hendrix with new animals, objects, and a new biome.

item.title: Pterosaur Remakes Pack 1
item.description: Two pterosaurs by Andrew12 and PrimevalRaptor, and a remake of the Quetzalcoatlus by Hendrix.

item.title: Pterosaur Remakes Pack 2
item.description: Six pterosaurs by Andrew12.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Temperate Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Chinese Alligator
item.description: The Chinese alligator is a crocodilian endemic to China.

item.title: Gray's Monitor
item.description: Gray’s monitor gets its common name from its previous scientific name of Varanus grayi.

item.title: Leopard Tortoise
item.description: Leopard tortoises have a huge range, being found on the savannahs of Africa from the Sudan South to the Cape Province of South Africa.

item.title: Red-Footed Tortoise
item.description: Also known as the South American red-footed tortoise, the males grow up to 13.5 inches (30.4 cm) and are somewhat larger than females.

item.title: South America Pack
item.description: From the high Andes Mountains to the lush tropical Amazon Forest lives an amazing array of wildlife. Welcome to South America!

item.title: American Alligator Pack
item.description: American alligators are usually found in freshwater swamps, marshes, rivers, lakes, and occasionally smaller bodies of water.

item.title: Fire Pack
item.description: From the hidden island of Drom emerges mythical beasts of fire.

item.title: Ornate Box Turtle
item.description: The ornate box turtle is one of two turtle species on the Great Plains that are terrestrial.

item.title: Crocodile Monitor
item.description: Generally arboreal, or tree dwelling. Crocodile monitors inhabit rainforests and adjacent savannas.

item.title: Nile Monitor Lizard
item.description: The Nile monitor is distributed across most of Africa, except the northwest.

item.title: Yacare Caiman
item.description: The yacare caiman is found in a variety of habitat types, often associated with floating mats of vegetation.

item.title: Africa's Spitters + Mini Snake Pack
item.description: A pack containing several cobras from Africa, perfect for your reptile houses.

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!

item.title: African Safari Pack
item.description: Summary of the African Safari Pack project
